body_html:
I can compile it on my machines. Can you help analyzing what's the compilation error？@fmassa.

On a 24 core machine, here's the result before and after(not all cores are used due to some other jobs):
Before:
100 log takes 5.80963611603 s
100 lgamma takes 35.9156820774 s
100 log1p takes 10.9080810547 s
100 sigmoid takes 14.3143601418 s
100 exp takes 9.00460505486 s
100 cos takes 6.2706618309 s
100 acos takes 5.83504891396 s
100 cosh takes 8.59435892105 s
100 sin takes 6.86743211746 s
100 asin takes 7.53593015671 s
100 sinh takes 15.2909600735 s
100 tan takes 22.3060238361 s
100 atan takes 9.83118796349 s
100 tanh takes 21.4653310776 s
100 sqrt takes 10.4988119602 s
100 rsqrt takes 11.9811530113 s
100 ceil takes 3.13585495949 s
100 floor takes 3.13819503784 s
100 round takes 8.66265702248 s
100 abs takes 1.0698261261 s
100 trunc takes 7.12609481812 s
100 frac takes 4.20164704323 s
100 neg takes 1.07381701469 s
100 reciprocal takes 2.43865990639 s
After:
100 log takes 0.529801845551 s
100 lgamma takes 21.4925720692 s
100 log1p takes 1.31075191498 s
100 sigmoid takes 2.08774805069 s
100 exp takes 0.882901906967 s
100 cos takes 0.810587882996 s
100 acos takes 0.531144857407 s
100 cosh takes 0.857820034027 s
100 sin takes 0.887897968292 s
100 asin takes 0.742435932159 s
100 sinh takes 1.7353990078 s
100 tan takes 2.28986883163 s
100 atan takes 1.33976507187 s
100 tanh takes 2.89112305641 s
100 sqrt takes 1.10230112076 s
100 rsqrt takes 1.47371006012 s
100 ceil takes 0.232032060623 s

100 trunc takes 0.608330965042 s

100 neg takes 0.13331413269 s
100 reciprocal takes 0.414337873459 s
